**The Supreme Pardon for Salvation and Deliverance**
*Sutra Title:* *The Supreme Pardon for Salvation and Deliverance*
*Author:* Unknown, likely composed during the Song or Yuan dynasties.
*Three fascicles.*
*Source Text:* *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, Memorials and Petitions Category.

**Fascicle One**

**Memorial for Prolonging Life and Dissolving Calamities**
*Used in the Seven Luminaries Retreat*

Your humble servant [Name], in profound reverence and awe, bows his head to the ground, prostrates himself, and respectfully addresses this memorial:

Though unworthy, I have been entrusted with the sacred rank, vowing to propagate the mysterious Daoist teachings. With earnest devotion, I now humbly submit this petition.

In accordance with the intent of this retreat, I reflect upon the vast expanse of the celestial vault, where the constellations trace their paths, governing the omens of the earth below and scrutinizing the fortunes and misfortunes of mortal lives. Moreover, destiny is apportioned like branches from a trunk, and fate is arrayed with blessings and punishments. The Six Jia and Three Origins cycle through the years and months, while the Three Disasters and Nine Calamities inspect the days and hours. Without the aid of various destinies to sustain the declining, how could disasters be dispelled and lifespans extended?

I respectfully present this memorial, to be heard by the Three Heavens. May the imperial grace shine boundlessly, and the celestial favor spread widely. May a mighty decree be issued, proclaiming to the sun, moon, and stellar lodges, to the jade armillary and the celestial balance, to the Three Heavenly Bureaus, the Twelve Branches of the Sky, the Sixty Jia-Zi, and the governing officials and lords: On behalf of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], may the calamities of their natal destiny be removed, and the afflictions of the current year’s transgressions be dissolved.

May the Two Cycles and Three Limits all be graced by auspicious stars, and the Eight Trigrams and Nine Palaces avoid encountering malevolent luminaries. May misfortunes be averted, and propitious omens continue unbroken.

I respectfully invoke:
- **The Southern Supreme Lord**, **The Lord of Longevity**, **The Cinnabar Register Lord**, **The Crimson Palace Lord**, **The Disaster-Dispelling Lord**, and **The Impurity-Dissolving Lord**, each attended by 120 officials and generals, to eradicate malevolent stars and deliver from calamities to extend life.
- **The True Unity Lord of Great Harmony**, **The Lord of Qi Circulation**, and **The Lord of Destiny-Fixing**, each with five attendants and 120 officials and generals, to harmonize the flow of the year and exorcise malevolent luminaries.
- **The Calamity-Dissolving and Punishment-Releasing Lord**, **The Lifespan-Extending and Destiny-Augmenting Lord**, **The Life-Petitioning and Life-Nurturing Lord**, **The Punishment-Restraining and Death-Repelling Lord**, **The Punishment-Cutting and Death-Severing Lord**, and **The Punishment-Enforcing and Death-Collecting Lord**, each with five attendants and 120 officials and generals, to augment destiny and prolong life, restraining punishments and death.
- **The Lord of Myriad Blessings**, **The Southern Culmen Lord**, **The Lord of Destiny**, **The Lord of Venus the Bright Star**, **The Jade Calendar Lord of Name-Fixing**, and **The Lords of the Treasury of Wealth and Treasury of Fortune**, each with five attendants and 120 officials and generals, to inscribe living names and erase the records of death.
- **The Lord of Soul-Restraining and Spirit-Controlling**, **The Lord of Jade Circuits**, and 1,200 **Plain-Clad Maidens of the Jade Calendar**, to restrain the hun-soul, guard the po-soul, record the spirits, and protect the qi.
- **The Heavenly Bureau Lord of Disaster-Dissolving and Misfortune-Removing**, **The Lords of the Five Directions’ Generative Qi**, **The Life-Extending Lord**, and the **Six Jia Generals with their attendant officials and soldiers**, to deliver from calamities, dispel disasters, expel evil, and preserve life.

May the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], enjoy harmony in their fate and limits, peace in body and destiny. In all movements and stillness, in all goings and comings, may the stars of fortune and swiftness attend them. In the divisions of the sky, may there be no clashes of disaster and punishment.

If Jupiter brings calamity, Venus shall restrain it.
If Saturn brings calamity, Jupiter shall restrain it.

If Venus brings calamity, Mars shall restrain it.
If Mercury brings calamity, Saturn shall restrain it.

Thus may the Five Phases be regulated, the Four Symbols harmonized, the foundation of fate be secured, the span of life be fortified, calamities be averted, decline be supported, disasters be dissolved, and destiny be preserved. May the blessings of life be widely extended, and the benevolence of nurturing all things be upheld.

As herein petitioned, may the mysterious favor be manifest. With reverence for the great Dao, we humbly seek mercy.

Your servant, in foolishness, respectfully submits this memorial through the Direct Envoys of the Two Bureaus, the Orthodox Unity Merit Officers, the Left and Right Envoys, the Yin-Yang Divine Decree Clerks, the Scarlet Talisman Chariot Clerks, the Just Wind Courier Clerks, the Post-Horse Memorial Clerks, the Flying Dragon Cavalry Clerks, the Phoenix Cavalry Memorial Officers, the Cloud-Dragon Cavalry Petition Officers, the Wind-Swift Cavalry Escort Officers, the Divine Dragon Cavalry Memorial Officers, and the Flying Dragon and Flying Tiger Cavalry—each pair dispatched to present the memorial.

Your servant, on behalf of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], respectfully submits this memorial to the Three Heavenly Bureaus. May the celestial grace respond in kind. Your servant, with awe and trepidation, bows his head to the ground, prostrates himself, and respectfully petitions for audience.

---

**Memorial for Earth-Thanking and House-Pacifying (Used in House-Pacifying Retreats)**

Your servant pledges his heart to the teachings and strives to deliver others. Though he measures his own inadequacy, he has long been nurtured by grace and dares to pour forth his meager devotion, aspiring to repay the boundless favor of the mountains and seas.

Your servant, in accordance with the retreat’s intent, reflects that the sponsor, [Name], in his worldly endeavors, has labored diligently to establish a household. In the construction of dwellings, the laying of foundations has been unsettled, and the shifting of earth and walls may have violated taboos. Moreover, the alignment of stars and the cycles of baleful spirits, the selection of days and hours, or inadvertent transgressions in direction and position may have invited misfortune. Seeking tranquility from the Earth Controller and refuge at the Imperial Threshold, he hopes for blessings and the preemptive dissolution of peril.

Respectfully submitting this memorial to the Three Heavens, may the August Ultimate bestow its auspicious influence, and the Azure Vault oversee and witness. May the qi of the Jade Purity Dao and the wondrous radiance of the Numinous Treasure descend and infuse the sponsor’s newly constructed dwelling, illuminating its interior and exterior, near and far, guiding myriad fortunes and repelling a thousand malevolent forces. May the true spirits be stationed to guard each corner, and any offended baleful spirits be turned toward benevolence. May generations and years be blessed with mysterious favor.

Your servant respectfully invokes:
- The Earth-Thanking Lords,
- The Earth-Restraining Lords,
- The Earth-Dissolving Lords,
- The Earth-Pacifying Lords,
- The Earth-Stabilizing Lords,
- The House-Pacifying Lords,
- The Five Directions’ Protective Lords,
- The Merit-Dissolving and Loss-Breaking Lords—each five in number,
- Their attendant officials and generals, one hundred twenty each,

to dissolve and absolve all violations of taboos incurred in the construction of the dwelling.

The Great Generals of the Grand Year and Grand Yin, the one hundred twenty official talismans, the baleful spirits of Toxic Fire, Hanging Guests, Funeral Gates, and all upper and lower malevolent forces—may they all be pacified and released. For any local deities displaced by excavation, may they be duly notified and restored to their original positions.

The Yang Direction Lords, the Upper-Pacifying Lords, the Right Capital Attendants, the Stone-Pacifying and Earth-Pacifying Lords—each one, with their attendant officials and generals, one hundred twenty each, and their inspecting officers and soldiers—are to gather and restrain the ghosts of the Earth Lords, preventing them from encroaching upon the village.

The Divine Lords of the Great Officers guarding the house, the Great Spirits guarding the house, and the Three Generals with their three hundred thousand soldiers are to expel and suppress the old qi of the Five Directions’ earth, intercept and sever malevolent spirits, and prevent them from encroaching.

The Generals of the Five Sacred Peaks, the Six Jia Divine Generals, the Five Directions’ House-Pacifying Great Generals, the House-Protecting Great Generals, the House-Guarding Great Generals, and the House-Securing Great Generals—eleven each—are to secure and pacify the dwelling, expel malevolent spirits, and dissolve the Nine Transverse Calamities, the Three Disasters, and the thousand misfortunes and myriad calamities.

May no harm come to the residents. Thus may the sponsor, [Name], from this day forward, enjoy peace in all affairs, a radiant dwelling, a serene household, and freedom from theft, loss, and misfortune. May water, fire, and official disasters not afflict his vicinity; may ghostly malevolence and illness be eradicated; may pestilence not arise; may his livelihood prosper; may his studies and arts flourish; may wealth and honor know no bounds; and may his family and dependents thrive in safety. Let this be the sign of efficacy.

---

**Memorial for Dispelling Pestilence and Protecting from Illness**

Your servant, unworthily appointed and presumptuously ranked among the honored, feels deep shame for his shallowness and has yet to attain the profound. Though he has repeatedly petitioned the celestial court and searched his own heart to recognize his faults, he humbly hopes for the boundless compassion of the august grace to bestow its nurturing mercy.

Your servant, in accordance with the retreat’s intent, reflects that the sponsor, [Name], though dwelling in the mundane world, must strive for his livelihood. Amid the Five Desires and Seven Emotions, how could he be free from obscuring entanglements? With the hundred wrongs and myriad transgressions, how could he avoid accumulating faults? Thus, he is assailed by cold, heat, dryness, and dampness, and his fate and destiny are beset by hardship. Suddenly afflicted by pestilential qi, he finds himself in peril. Without the imperial grace’s compassion, how could his remaining years be blessed?

Respectfully submitting this memorial to the Three Heavens, may the great virtue, in its boundless mercy, bestow the qi of the Jade Purity Dao and the wondrous radiance of the Numinous Treasure to infuse the sponsor’s body and household. May the upright qi shine brightly, malevolent influences be driven far away, disasters be dissolved, calamities be averted, life be preserved, and longevity be extended.

Your servant respectfully invokes:
- The Lords of the Nine Yi of the Northern Gate,
- The Lords of the Northern Black Heavenly Mechanism,
- The Qi-Directing and Calamity-Dissolving Lords,
- The Earth Bureau Qi-Supervising Lords—each five in number,
- Their attendant officials and generals, one hundred twenty each,
- The Five Transforming Clerks of the Northern City,
- The Great Officer of the Celestial Market—one,
- The Four Hundred Thousand Soldiers of the Five Pestilence Qi Divisions,
- The Ten Million Soldiers of the Great Celestial Army,

to gather and restrain pestilential toxins and sever the qi of epidemics.

The Lords of the Nine Yi of the East, the Eighty-One Official Lords, are to sever the green pestilence and green toxins’ qi.
The Lords of the Eight Man of the South, the Sixty-Four Official Lords, are to sever the red pestilence and red toxins’ qi.
The Lords of the Six Rong of the West, the Thirty-Six Official Lords, are to sever the white pestilence and white toxins’ qi.
The Lords of the Five Di of the North, the Twenty-Five Official Lords, are to sever the black pestilence and black toxins’ qi.
The Lords of the Three Qin of the Center, the Twelve Official Lords, are to sever the yellow pestilence and yellow toxins’ qi.

The Great Hu Elder Lord, the Three Generals guarding the household, the Left and Right Three Divisions’ Generals, the Qi-Directing and Calamity-Dissolving Lords of the Red Yang Soldiers, the Lords of the Five Pestilence Qi Divisions, with their three hundred thousand soldiers each, together with the Lords of the Village Altars, Wells, and Towns, are to unite in gathering, expelling, and restraining the pestilence ghosts.

The Central Palace’s Patroling Grand General, Chariot and Cavalry Grand General, Vanguard Fire Tiger-Rush Grand General, Heaven-Monitoring Valiant Grand General, Intercepting Grand General, Vanguard Fire Grand General, Valiant Cavalry Grand General, Severing Tiger-Rush Grand General, Net-Dragon Tiger Grand General, Pursuing Flying Grand General, and Heaven-Swallowing Earth-Cutting Grand General—each one, with seven hundred thousand officials and soldiers—are to gather and sever the five pestilence accumulations, preventing their encroachment upon neighboring villages.

The Heaven-Shaking Earth-Moving Soldiers—one hundred thousand strong—the Heaven-Punishing Lords, Hu-Yue Cavalry Lords, Yin-Yang Divine Judgment Officials, Qi-Seizing Qi-Consuming Officials, Spirit-Seizing Spirit-Consuming Officials, Ghost-Seizing Ghost-Consuming Officials, and Toxin-Seizing Toxin-Consuming Officials—each one; the Red Yue Great Hu Lords—one thousand two hundred; the Three-Five Original Destiny Merit Officers and Envoys, and the Stalwart-Striking Piercing Generals—fifteen each; the Vajra Eight Slayers’ Soldiers—ninety-six each—are to gather and capture pestilence ghosts, sweep away epidemic qi, prevent mutual contagion, and avert calamity befalling the village gates, thereby dissolving the toxins afflicting so-and-so, restoring the source of illness, with Heavenly Physicians supporting the body and numinous medicines aiding the person, so that the household, from the honored to the humble, may together attain auspicious blessings.

**Petition for Gathering Malevolence, Severing Anomalies, Dissolving Calamities, and Preserving Life**

Your servant, humble and unworthy, dull-witted and benighted, has long been bathed in vast grace, presumptuously overseeing the Mysterious Teachings. Vowing to ferry others with fervor, I strive to assist in the propagation of transformation. For all who take refuge, how dare I forget to make supplication?

Your servant, in accordance with the intent of the fast, humbly reflects: the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, has encountered adversity in fate, his person beset by malevolent anomalies, leading to disquiet in sleep and sustenance, and derangement in spirit and mind. This has given rise to illness, where medicines and remedies prove ineffectual. Fearing entanglement in karmic grievances, which linger unresolved, as time passes, the strange symptoms grow more severe. Without petitioning the Void and Mysterious, how could grace flow to the encompassing hub?

Respectfully, I present a petition to the Three Heavens, prostrating in hope that boundless compassion will be generously bestowed, and special favor granted. May the Jade Clarity’s Dao-qi and Numinous Treasure’s wondrous radiance be poured into the person and household of the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, illuminating within and without, brightening the gates and halls. Where the numinous light shines, malevolent spirits shall depart afar; illness shall be pacified and healed, and longevity prolonged.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Heavenly Numinous Officials of Severing Malevolence, the Merit Officers, the Spirit-Guarding Body Officials, the Malevolence-Severing Envoys, the Body-Protecting Generals, the Malevolence-Inspecting Direct Talismans, the Malevolence-Severing Piercing Treacherous Officials, and the Spirit-Seizing Envoys, who are to drive away and expel spectral beings and capture inauspicious malevolence.

The Life-Preserving Grand General, Life-Continuing Grand General, Malevolence-Driving Grand General, Malevolence-Severing Grand General, and Calamity-Ferrying Grand General—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals each—are to dissolve calamities and dispel spectral malevolence.

The Peaceful Stone-Guarding Lord—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals; the Supreme Qi-Monitoring Lord—one, with seven hundred thousand soldiers; the Heavenly Stalwart Great Soldiers’ Five Ding Lords—one million; the Supreme Heaven-Born Lords—five, with one hundred twenty soldiers each; the Heaven-Covering Grand General, with seven hundred thousand soldiers; the Five Lakes’ Grand Drum Generals; the Armor-Reversing Scale-Inverting Soldiers—four hundred thousand; the Ghost-Seizing Ghost-Consuming Officials and Qi-Seizing Qi-Consuming Officials, and Spirit-Seizing Spirit-Consuming Officials, are to gather and capture all malevolent lords who harass the living.

The Supreme Central Palace’s Five Section Commanders’ Soldiers—five hundred thousand; the Pure Mystery Duke—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to capture and restrain ghostly bandits and overbearing criminals.

The Year Jia Lord, Great Jia Lord, and Vermilion Yin Lord—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals each; the Five Heavenly Marquis Generals’ Soldiers—one hundred thousand—are to seize and execute spectral beings, eradicating them without remnant.

The Yang Brightness Lord—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—together with the local true officials, various departments’ officials and soldiers, the altars of the soil and grain, the spirits of mountains and forests, and the elders of the graves, shall unite in strength with the household-guarding deities of the home, pursuing and apprehending without allowing concealment or omission, escorting them to the Heavenly Prison, and eradicating them according to the law.

Furthermore, I invoke the Left and Right Yin-Yang Grand Physician Officials to heal the source of illness; the Supreme Harmony True One Life-Preserving Lord to dissolve and dispel baleful influences. May the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, attain peace and harmony in body, the annihilation of malevolent spirits, the healing of illness, and the harmonization of medicines and diet. May his family and dependents enjoy well-being, his gates and halls be pure and solemn, his daily life proceed as he wishes, his plans and actions succeed, and may he forever preserve advantage and integrity, as a token of efficacy.

**Petition for Preserving Health and Dissolving Calamities, for Use in Blessing Fasts**

Your servant, ignorant in learning and coarse in nature, has fortunately received the blessings of former lives, presumptuously ascending the true ranks. Vowing to exert myself in salvation’s toil, I strive to repay the virtue of life’s creation.

Your servant, in accordance with the intent of the fast, humbly considers: the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, suffers from calamitous decline in fate, his form and spirit withered and emaciated. The three karmas and ten evils have long burdened his conduct and reclusion; the six luminaries and five planets have temporarily aligned in adverse positions. Suddenly afflicted by illness, his sleep and sustenance are disturbed; medicines and remedies prove ineffectual, and time passes ever longer. Startled day and night, he finds no avenue for appeal. Without relying on divine shelter, how could he attain recovery?

Respectfully, I present a petition to the Three Heavens, prostrating in hope that boundless compassion will generously bestow beneficent grace. May the Jade Clarity’s Dao-qi and Numinous Treasure’s wondrous radiance be poured into the person and household of the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, dissolving calamitous qi and illuminating with numinous light, so that his present illness may soon be pacified.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Yang Order Lord—one, with one hundred twenty Life-Commanding Officials—to swiftly heal severe, unhealed illnesses.

The Momentary Lord and Red Heaven Qi-Consuming Lord—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to heal long-standing, debilitating illnesses.

The Spirit-Gathering Supreme Clarity Lord—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—is to clarify the spirit and mind, severing baleful dreams.

The Red Star Lord and the Three Heavens’ Comfort-and-Heal Lord—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to restrain and sever familial strife that arises with the times.

The Release-from-Torment Lord, the Life-Span-Extending Lord, the Destiny-Augmenting Lord, the Calamity-Eradicating Lord, the Patroling Great General, and the Earth-Burning Great General—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to gather and record wayward spirits, dispelling old qi.

The Fire Dragon Lords, the Mountain-Encirclement Lords, and the Brightness-Restraining Great Masters—five each, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to regulate yellow-robed physicians.

The Life-Commanding Jade Maidens and the Moon-Mystery Jade Maidens—one thousand two hundred each—are to uphold divine formulas and the Supreme Immortals’ Bright Hall.

One thousand two hundred Jade Maidens are to administer treatments according to prescriptions.

Twelve Grand Medical Officials of the Central Palace are to select formulas and compound medicines.

Twelve Heavenly Physicians, twelve Official Physicians, and twelve Grand Physicians of the Five Offices—each group of twelve—are to enter the viscera, bowels, meridians, and joints, circulating spirit and storing qi.

Twelve Heavenly Clerks of the Celestial Bureau and twelve Grand Medical Officials of the Upper Peace, along with fifteen Merit-Recording Clerks for Healing, are to ascend to the Phoenix Supreme Clarity Palace and retrieve the five-colored divine medicines.

The Harmonizing Official Lord, the Wooden Office for Healing Illnesses, the Metal Office for Holding Medicines, the Water Office for Holding Needles, the Fire-and-Water Office, and the Earth Office for Moxibustion—each one, in harmonious virtue—are to render extraordinary merit.

The East Azure Qi-Generating Lord, the South Vermilion Qi-Generating Lord, the West White Qi-Generating Lord, the North Black Qi-Generating Lord, and the Central Yellow Qi-Generating Lord—each, leading their officers and soldiers—are to expel evil and gather illness.

The Southern Prosperity Vermilion Yang Lord, the Yellow Elder Lord, the Heavenly Soul Lord, and the Earthly Spirit Lord—each one—are to revive and generate life.

One thousand two hundred Jade Maidens and one thousand two hundred Jade Calendar Plain Maidens are to support and avert disasters, delivering and liberating lifespans.

May the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, thus enjoy a robust qi-body, with calamities and declines dissolved, pernicious spirits kept far away, litigations and misfortunes pacified, illnesses and afflictions eradicated, life and body secured, medicines efficacious, movements and rests free from demonic interference, and destiny flourishing and propitious—all as tokens of efficacy.

**Transmission of the Dharma, Conferral of the Dao, Prayer for Grace, and Atonement for Transgressions**

Your servant, undeserving of imperial favor and overstepping to inherit the lineage of masters, aspires to guide later disciples and humbly continue the work of former worthies. Presumptuously presenting this private petition, I look up in gratitude for the profound grace of nurturance.

Your servant, in accordance with the fast’s intent, reflects that the Jade Statutes of the Female Azure and the selection of candidates are most arduous, while the Golden Regulations of the Supreme Ultimate and the responsibilities of sponsorship are especially weighty. If transmission and conferral deviate from practice, both master and disciple will transgress the statutes.

Now the disciple, so-and-so, purifies himself to seek the true, wishing to partake in the supreme Dharma. Yet upon quiet reflection, hindrances and encumbrances are manifold: perhaps his spirit-qi is difficult to preserve for cultivation of longevity, or his bone-phase does not accord with Dao-potency; perhaps the lawsuits of his nine ancestors and seven generations remain unresolved, or the grudges of four debts and three lives persist; perhaps karmic retributions from past and present lives still linger, or past errors and present misdeeds remain unforgiven. Without the gift of refinement, how can his lofty aspirations be fulfilled?

Respectfully presenting a memorial, I submit it to the Three Heavens, hoping for the gracious bestowal of mysterious favor and the compassionate regard of this red petition. May the Dao-qi of Jade Clarity and the wondrous radiance of Numinous Treasure be poured into the five palaces and six mansions of the disciple, so-and-so, so that his upright qi may shine brilliantly, his Dao-heart be awakened, numinous light envelop him, and delusory encumbrances dissolve.

Further, I beseech the salvation of his life, proclaiming to the Three Realms and the Ten Directions, and all relevant mystical bureaus, to specifically eradicate and dissolve his karmic retributions and litigations, absolve his transgressions, inscribe his name in the Mysterious Register, and fix his destiny in the Azure Tablet.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Supreme Nine Heavenly Thearchs, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Thearchs, the Five Elder Thearchs, the Palace of the Sun and the Mansion of the Moon, the Five Planets and Four Luminaries, the Southern Asterism and Northern Culmen, the Star Lords of the Constellations, the Three Ministries and Five Masters, the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus, the Heavenly Clerks in charge, the True Spirits of the Four Caverns, the Grotto-Heavens of Blessed Lands, the Five Marchmounts and Four Watercourses, the Earth-and-Water Administrators, and the deities of the Three Realms—all to assemble at the Mysterious Altar and witness the transmission and conferral.

I further invoke the Six Divisions of Numinous Treasure, the Immortal Officials of the Three Realms, the Mysterious Bureaus of all directions, the Illustrious Immortal Bureaus, the Scripture-Attending Guardians of the Mysterious Altar, the Protectors of the Dao and Descenders of the True, the Summoned and Affiliated Immortal Clerks, the Nine Heavens’ Life-Commanding Mansion, the Azure Mystery and Yellow Register Courts, the Jade Clarity Divine Empyrean Jade Mansion, the Supreme Clarity Youthful Primordial Mansion, the Mysterious Numinous Pivot Mansion, the Northern Culmen Mysterious Model Mansion, the Numinous Treasure As-You-Wish Myriad Bureaus, the Nine Heavens’ Universal Salvation Court, and all relevant generals, divine clerks, jade lads, and jade maidens for the transmission.

Let the generals and officials swiftly divide their luminous forms, follow the incense and fire, wait upon the proceedings, and assist in the proclamation and execution.

May the disciple, so-and-so, swear oaths before the myriad spirits, pledge alliances with the host of sages, diligently cultivate and advance, study the Dao and seek the true, maintain mindfulness and practice, aid the living and deliver the departed, assume immortal office, align his heart with the Mysterious Origin, attain luminous wisdom, benefit with compassion, extinguish demonic trials, daily accumulate numinous blessings, enhance his reputation, draw near and distant followers, perfect his merits and complete his Dao, ascend bodily as an immortal, eternally propagate the true wind, glorify his lineage, vow to endure through the vast kalpas, and return to revere the Mysterious Origin.

If my petition is granted, may the sagely work be manifestly revealed.

**Atonement for Transgressions and Prayer for Rain: Memorial for the Thunder-and-Lightning Fast**

Your servant, foolish and unworthy, of no merit and full of errors, has long relied on the grace of nurturance and striven to refine his resolve. Charged with transmitting the teachings and promulgating virtue to aid others, I dutifully report all who seek refuge.

Your servant, in accordance with the fast’s intent, reflects that spring plowing and autumn harvest are the constants of agriculture, while prolonged drought and scorching yang are aberrations of qi-movement. If timely rain does not spread for sowing, how can fine grain be hoped for in abundant harvest? Moreover, the fields are parched as if burned, and the common folk are filled with sorrow and sighs—how can the year be brought to completion? Famine is imminent. Truly, the accumulated transgressions of the myriad masses are vast, and the divine reproach of the earth-administering deities is not slight. The power of the Thearch cannot attend to the people’s lamentations.

A memorial is hereby reverently submitted to the Three Heavens, humbly beseeching the Dao’s all-accomplishing virtue and the compassionate response of boundless mercy. May a special edict be issued, commanding all true administrations across the ten directions and three realms to absolve the hidden and manifest transgressions of the common people and to relieve the hardships of a year imperiled by famine. Let sweet rains swiftly descend to nourish the young shoots. Further, may the authorities governing thunder and lightning, the officers presiding over wind and rain, the dragon deities of deep ravines and sacred springs, the city gods and mountain spirits, the altars of soil and grain, and all subordinate deities under their jurisdiction each embody merciful benevolence. Let the Lords of Wind and Rain be summoned, the Thunder Duke and Lightning Mother be directed, that timely rains may universally moisten the parched earth and revive the withered crops.

Your servant reverently petitions the Heavenly Elder of Upright Qi, the Perfected of the River’s Edge, the Nine Seas’ Nine Rivers’ Northern Mystery Lords—one each—and their retinue of one hundred twenty officials, who govern the qi of water sources and summon clouds to bring rain. From the sea, one thousand two hundred Jade Maidens; from the rivers, thirty-six Lords of the River, including Master Lü’s Heir, who command the activation of water veins and the descent of wind and rain. The Lords of the Four Continents and Nine Valleys, the Luminous Lord of the Han Terrace, the Nine Provinces’ Mysterious Darkness Lords, the Nine Rivers’ Northern Mystery Lords, and the Nine Lords of the Feudatories—one each—with their retinues of one hundred twenty officials each, and one thousand two hundred Jade Maidens of the lakes, who summon and dispatch the River Earl’s envoys, the Azure Water Thearch, the Nine Rivers’ Water Thearchs, the Twelve Stream Maidens, the water-department spirits and river-pacifying officers, to act in concert and bring rain. May they descend in timely fashion upon the realm’s borders, driving thunder and dispatching lightning, stirring winds and spreading clouds. First, let gentle rains fall upon the rivers; next, let torrents pour across the fields and wilds. May sweet rains promptly answer the season’s call, reviving withered grain and turning barren plains to green. May the shoots flower and bear fruit, the year yield abundance, and calamities be averted. Let joy resound across the plains, and gladness echo among the aged. May the petitioner’s lifelong devotion be fulfilled, and the grace of foundational blessings be generously bestowed. Further, may all grains ripen, the nine regions prosper, locusts vanish without trace, and malevolent spirits retreat into hiding. Let the three agricultural seasons bring full bellies and warm clothing, and may all people, in serving their elders and nurturing their young, live a hundred years in radiant splendor. Should this plea be granted, the imperial favor shall shine forth in full.

A second memorial is reverently submitted to the Three Heavens, beseeching continued grace. Your servant, a lowly speck of dust, unworthy and base, has presumptuously received the true teachings yet possesses no merit worthy of record, only countless faults deserving of censure. Yet, through the boundless grace of nurturing protection, I dare to prostrate nine times in utmost sincerity and offer these humble words, trusting they may reach the celestial hearing.

Your servant, in accordance with the fast’s intent, reflects that the bond between father and child is the foundation of human relations, and the proper distinction between husband and wife is the constant of heavenly affinity. If one’s fate is afflicted by solitary stars or adverse conjunctions—whether by encountering the Widow Star, mutual imprisonment, or clashes with penal stars—so that the line of descent remains unfulfilled and the ancestral lineage finds no heir, then as twilight approaches and the years hasten toward decline, without petitioning the Dark Vault of Heaven, how can one hope to receive the grace of the Yellow Prime?

A memorial is hereby reverently submitted to the Three Heavens, humbly beseeching the great virtue of cherishing life and the perfect benevolence that excludes none. **Instructions for Writing the Petition:**
This petition shall be written on yellow paper in vermilion ink. The paper shall be one chi, one cun, and six fen in height, with each line one cun and two fen in width. The text shall be written in single columns, with each line containing seventeen characters. On the first sheet, the back shall have two lines, leaving the third line blank before writing the title of the petition in an overlapping manner. Below this, write: *"Your humble servant, [Name], prostrates himself in awe and reverence, bowing his head to the ground in repeated obeisance."*

This line shall not be written on the back. The length may vary as needed. On the fourth line, write *"respectfully submits this petition"* (上言), indented one cun from the title. This line shall then be written on the back with seventeen characters. From *"respectfully submits this petition"* onward, each line shall follow the prescribed format, leaving half a space at the top and ensuring no continuation at the bottom.

The name of the petitioner shall be written as a single character, without splitting it across lines. Characters such as *ghost* (鬼), *inauspicious* (凶), *death* (死), *thief* (贼), or any other ill-omened words shall not appear at the top of a line. Conversely, characters such as *immortal* (仙), *person* (人), *life* (生), or other auspicious words shall not appear at the bottom of a line.

At the conclusion, append the following:
*"I humbly beseech the Supreme Mystery to distinguish and heed this plea. Your foolish servant relies upon the Direct Envoys of the Two Bureaus, the Orthodox Unity Merit Officers, the Left and Right Bureau Envoys, the Yin-Yang Spirit Talisman Clerks, the Scarlet Talisman Chariot Clerks, the Gale Courier Clerks, the Post-Horse Petition Clerks, the Flying Dragon Mount Clerks, the Phoenix Mounts for Petition Delivery, the Cloud Dragon Mounts for Petition Ascent, the Wind-Swift Mounts for Petition Dispatch, the Divine Dragon Mounts for Imperial Petitions, and the Flying Dragon and Flying Tiger Mounts for Memorial Submission—each accompanied by two attendants—to dispatch them."*

*"On behalf of the sponsor of this retreat, [Name], I present this [Title] Petition, submitting it to the Courts of the Three Heavens. I humbly pray that the celestial grace may grant its response."*

*"With awe and reverence, I prostrate myself, bowing my head to the ground in repeated obeisance, and respectfully submit this petition."*

The words *"submit this petition"* (以闻) shall be indented one character from the preceding line, with three blank lines separating them from *"bowing his head to the ground in repeated obeisance"* (再拜). The petitioner’s name, [Surname, Name], along with their affiliation to [State, County, Township, Village, Temple, and Retreat], shall be written starting from the middle of the line and extending to the bottom, aligning with the edge of the paper.

Three blank lines follow, then the text is written in staggered form:
*"The Great Dao bears the title: 'The Supreme, Formless, Nameless, Void, and Spontaneous Utmost True Great Dao, the Most High and Mysterious August One of the Golden Watchtower and Seven Jeweled Jade Palace.'"*
This line shall be written on the reverse side, measuring four inches and eight fen in length.

Three blank lines follow, then from the middle of the line is written:
*"In the year of the Great Year [Year], the [Month] month, [Day] day, at [Location], respectfully submitted."*
The remainder of the line shall align with the bottom edge of the paper, leaving all space after the year of the Great Year blank.

The petition must not be written across days, and the Great Dao’s title must not be filled in across hours. Thus, the hour, the dot after "Palace," and the character *"submit"* within *"submit this petition"* are left blank. These shall remain unfilled until the petition is reviewed, at which time they are completed.

If the petition risks delay, at the top write:
*"By the protective authority of the Great Dao’s office, [Surname, Name] submits this petition."*
The envelope shall be sealed with a square case.

*"Respectfully delivered to the Gates of the Three Heavens."*
At the bottom, list the title and office of the Dharma Master, followed by:
*"[Surname, Name] respectfully seals this petition with reverence."*
The petition is then placed inside the envelope.

The petition envelope shall be one foot and two inches in length and one inch and eight fen in width. This disciple declares: united by the bond of master and friend, my heart is overwhelmed with sorrow. Upon the arrival of this amnesty decree, the wardens shall implement it without delay. Memorializing the Azure Mystery Supreme Emperor, let copies be made swiftly and distributed to all subordinate offices, to be reverently obeyed in accordance with the imperial edict. Let there be no delay, as wind and fire.

Memorial issued.
*Year*　*Month*　*Day*

*Submitted by [Rank] [Name], bearing the decree and executing the mandate.*
*Overseeing the Affairs of the Left Bureau of the Azure Mystery Yellow Register,*
*Judging the Affairs of the Left Bureau of the Azure Mystery Yellow Register.*

To the right: The Precious Amnesty of the Azure Mystery, used for the Azure Mystery Salvation Fast. The format for writing it remains as before, and the filling of the edict upon receiving the rescript follows the same procedure. Only this "edict" character with the "leak" radical is to be used. On the front, as before; on the reverse, write in large characters: *"Memorial of the Left Bureau of the Azure Mystery Yellow Register to the Wardens of the Nine Dark Realms and the Myriad Underworld Offices."* It shall be dispatched together with the Nine Dragon Talismans.

The Precious Amnesty of the August Jade Emperor’s Sacred Title, used for the Nine Heavens Fast.

Memorial of the Supreme Mystery Capital to the Wardens of the Nine Dark Realms and the Myriad Underworld Offices.

Decree to the Gate of Decrees:

Heaven bestows and Earth generates, we look up to the great creation of Qian and Kun; yang closes and yin opens, in accord with the constant alternation of day and night. Thus, while the Black Register Office interrogates and investigates, the Purple Ultimate abundantly extends mercy and forgiveness. We speak of the Six Destinies, none more pitiable than the Nine Dark Realms. Long nights of delusion entangle the mechanisms of karma in the abyssal depths; the mists of the Yellow Springs enclose the nets of grievance. Though they may harbor repentant hearts, who shall guide their nature to seek life? In silent contemplation of their plight, we find them truly pitiable.

Now, in accordance with the memorial submitted by the Dharma Master bearing the decree for the fast, we await the imperial rescript. Memorializing the Supreme Emperor, we humbly present the words of the memorial, fully expressing our earnest devotion.

With utmost reverence, we contemplate the august title of the Jade Emperor Supreme Sovereign—this name transcends all names, supreme beyond all supremacy. Those who hear it find ten thousand sins dissolved; those who attain it see a thousand grievances unraveled. His benevolence permeates the cosmos, his deeds recorded in sacred annals. With each proclamation of amnesty, it is as though the Emperor himself descends in person.

Let us now broadly proclaim his virtuous decree and resplendently unfold his precious edict, that all who suffer in the lower destinies may equally attain the blissful realms.

By imperial command, a great amnesty shall be granted throughout the Three Realms. All souls in the Nine Dark Realms who committed offenses prior to the establishment of the altar on the appointed day of this month—*excepting* those guilty of the Ten Heinous Crimes, the Five Treacheries, disloyalty, unfilial conduct, slander of the Great Dao, or destruction of scriptural teachings—shall be pardoned. All other transgressions, whether discovered or undiscovered, adjudicated or unadjudicated, endured in suffering or yet to be endured, punished or yet to be punished, regardless of severity, shall be absolved without exception.

For all mountain and river deities who have rendered meritorious service to the people, local magistrates shall compile and submit reports of their deeds for promotion and reward.

For all underworld officials and yin ministers who have not imposed excessive punishments nor bestowed undue rewards, they shall be elevated to celestial ranks and, in due order, appointed to fill vacancies among the yang officials.

For all beings confined in the Three Paths and Five Sufferings, or exiled and enslaved in the Earth and Water Bureaus, their fetters shall be struck off, their past offenses erased, their enmities resolved, and their bonds severed. They shall depart the dark paths and be reborn in realms of bliss.

For all beings of the Six Destinies and Four Births, endlessly bound in karmic retribution, their transgressions shall be forgiven, their grievances reconciled, that they may escape the wheel of rebirth and ascend to the realms of goodness.

For all the departed souls delivered by the Mysterious Altar—[here insert names]—and for their Nine Ancestral Generations and Seven Lineages, along with all karmically connected kin through countless kalpas, their past resentments shall be dissolved, their evil roots extirpated. They shall receive transformation, transcend this life, and abide in carefree bliss.

For all those who met untimely deaths, whose souls and spirits languish in the nether realms, their transgressions shall be erased, their grievances released. According to their merit, they shall be reborn, spared the darkness of the wheel.

For all souls in the Blood Pool Hell, their offenses shall be cleansed, their enmities purged, mother and child reunited, body and spirit transcendent.

For all wandering souls who have received offerings and deliverance from descendants but have yet to ascend, they shall be guided forthwith. All merits accrued from past rites, great or small, shall ensure their ascent, that none remain trapped in the yin realms.

For all the myriad souls of the Nine Provinces and Ten Regions—soldiers and civilians, scholars and farmers, artisans and merchants, men and women, old and young, with or without descendants, whether they met violent or peaceful ends—all who have long languished in the dark realms without deliverance shall have their grievances washed away, their transgressions dispersed. Swiftly shall they be turned on the wheel of rebirth to be born in joyous realms.

For any matters not fully enumerated in this amnesty, local magistrates shall compile and submit detailed reports.

Alas! Even those in dire pain cry out to Heaven, hoping for relief from their burdens. How much more, then, should those who fast and serve the Emperor expect their faults to be cleansed? Now, with the imperial edict so thoroughly proclaimed and the precious decree so radiantly manifest, let the Ten Flowers extol its praise, let the Three Realms bow in reverence. May the spring of deliverance return to the dark paths, may the dawn break in the frozen courts. Below, let the gates of death be sealed; above, let the gates of life swing wide. All you who hold office in these realms, take heed and comply.

Upon receipt of this amnesty, the responsible officials shall implement it without delay. The edict is hereby transmitted by imperial command for copying and distribution to all subordinate offices, to be observed in accordance with the Emperor’s decree. Let it be executed with the swiftness of wind and fire.

Thus the memorial is concluded.

[Date] [Month] [Year]
[Official Title] [Name], bearing the decree and executing the command
[List of Eight Ministerial Positions]

To the right: The Jade Emperor’s August Title and Precious Amnesty, to be employed in the Nine Heavens Life-Generating Fast.
The format for transcription, once the imperial assent is granted, shall follow the above, with only the character "敕" (edict) permitted to be omitted. On the reverse, inscribe: "Memorial from the Supreme Mystery Capital to the Lords of the Nine Dark Realms and the Myriad Underworld Offices."
*Concluding the Lower Scroll of the Supreme Emperor’s Salvific Amnesty Ritual.*

chunks.original_text: 太上济度章赦 经名：太上济度章赦。 撰人不详，似出矜宋元以徒。 三卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部表奏类。 太上济度章赦卷上 章 延生解厄章七曜斋用 具位臣某诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再拜上言：臣滥叨真秩，誓畅玄风，凡激切以皈投，盍殷葱而敷奏。 臣谨据斋意，臣仰惟圆穹广覆，列纬经行，司下土之机祥，察人生之祸福，况命分枝干，运列禄刑，六甲三元，周行岁月，三灾九厄，巡察日时，自非诸命以扶衰，曷俾消灾而益算。 谨为拜章一通，上闻三天，伏望帝恩昭旷，宸泽敷罗，特降劲命，宣告日月星宿，璇玑玉衡，三天玄曹，十二分野，六十甲子，主宰官君，特为斋主某人除本生身命之灾，解流年临犯之厄。 二运三限，俱进吉星，八卦九宫，无逢恶曜，庶镯灾患，近续祯祥。 臣谨为上请南上君、寿命君、丹秩君、绛宫君、消灾君、解秽君各一人，官将各一百二十人，主消灭恶星，度厄益寿。 太和真一好生君、运气君、定贵君各五人，官将各一百二十人，主和顺流年，禳解恶曜。 解刑度厄君、延寿益算君、请命好生君、收刑却煞君、断刑绝煞君、执刑收煞君各五人，官将各一百二十人，主益算延年，拘制刑煞。 万福君、南极君、司命君、太白明星君、定名玉历君、财库禄库君各五人，官将各一百二十人，主增注生名，削落死籍。 拘魂制魄君，周玉君各一人，玉历素女千二百人，主拘魂守魄，录神卫气。 天曹解灾去祸君、五方生炁君、益命延寿君、六甲将军从官吏兵，主度厄消灾，除邪保命。 庶使斋主某人运限协和，身命安泰，动静出入，有禄马之加临，分野踱离，无灾刑之冲战。 木星为灾，金星制之。 土星为灾，木星制之。

**The Supreme Pardon for Salvation and Deliverance**
*Sutra Title:* *The Supreme Pardon for Salvation and Deliverance*
*Author:* Unknown, likely composed during the Song or Yuan dynasties.
*Three fascicles.*
*Source Text:* *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, Memorials and Petitions Category.

**Fascicle One**

**Memorial for Prolonging Life and Dissolving Calamities**
*Used in the Seven Luminaries Retreat*

Your humble servant [Name], in profound reverence and awe, bows his head to the ground, prostrates himself, and respectfully addresses this memorial:

Though unworthy, I have been entrusted with the sacred rank, vowing to propagate the mysterious Daoist teachings. With earnest devotion, I now humbly submit this petition.

In accordance with the intent of this retreat, I reflect upon the vast expanse of the celestial vault, where the constellations trace their paths, governing the omens of the earth below and scrutinizing the fortunes and misfortunes of mortal lives. Moreover, destiny is apportioned like branches from a trunk, and fate is arrayed with blessings and punishments. The Six Jia and Three Origins cycle through the years and months, while the Three Disasters and Nine Calamities inspect the days and hours. Without the aid of various destinies to sustain the declining, how could disasters be dispelled and lifespans extended?

I respectfully present this memorial, to be heard by the Three Heavens. May the imperial grace shine boundlessly, and the celestial favor spread widely. May a mighty decree be issued, proclaiming to the sun, moon, and stellar lodges, to the jade armillary and the celestial balance, to the Three Heavenly Bureaus, the Twelve Branches of the Sky, the Sixty Jia-Zi, and the governing officials and lords: On behalf of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], may the calamities of their natal destiny be removed, and the afflictions of the current year’s transgressions be dissolved.

May the Two Cycles and Three Limits all be graced by auspicious stars, and the Eight Trigrams and Nine Palaces avoid encountering malevolent luminaries. May misfortunes be averted, and propitious omens continue unbroken.

I respectfully invoke:
- **The Southern Supreme Lord**, **The Lord of Longevity**, **The Cinnabar Register Lord**, **The Crimson Palace Lord**, **The Disaster-Dispelling Lord**, and **The Impurity-Dissolving Lord**, each attended by 120 officials and generals, to eradicate malevolent stars and deliver from calamities to extend life.
- **The True Unity Lord of Great Harmony**, **The Lord of Qi Circulation**, and **The Lord of Destiny-Fixing**, each with five attendants and 120 officials and generals, to harmonize the flow of the year and exorcise malevolent luminaries.
- **The Calamity-Dissolving and Punishment-Releasing Lord**, **The Lifespan-Extending and Destiny-Augmenting Lord**, **The Life-Petitioning and Life-Nurturing Lord**, **The Punishment-Restraining and Death-Repelling Lord**, **The Punishment-Cutting and Death-Severing Lord**, and **The Punishment-Enforcing and Death-Collecting Lord**, each with five attendants and 120 officials and generals, to augment destiny and prolong life, restraining punishments and death.
- **The Lord of Myriad Blessings**, **The Southern Culmen Lord**, **The Lord of Destiny**, **The Lord of Venus the Bright Star**, **The Jade Calendar Lord of Name-Fixing**, and **The Lords of the Treasury of Wealth and Treasury of Fortune**, each with five attendants and 120 officials and generals, to inscribe living names and erase the records of death.
- **The Lord of Soul-Restraining and Spirit-Controlling**, **The Lord of Jade Circuits**, and 1,200 **Plain-Clad Maidens of the Jade Calendar**, to restrain the hun-soul, guard the po-soul, record the spirits, and protect the qi.
- **The Heavenly Bureau Lord of Disaster-Dissolving and Misfortune-Removing**, **The Lords of the Five Directions’ Generative Qi**, **The Life-Extending Lord**, and the **Six Jia Generals with their attendant officials and soldiers**, to deliver from calamities, dispel disasters, expel evil, and preserve life.

May the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], enjoy harmony in their fate and limits, peace in body and destiny. In all movements and stillness, in all goings and comings, may the stars of fortune and swiftness attend them. In the divisions of the sky, may there be no clashes of disaster and punishment.

If Jupiter brings calamity, Venus shall restrain it.
If Saturn brings calamity, Jupiter shall restrain it.

chunks.original_text: 金星为灾，火星制之。 水星为灾，土星制之。 俾得调理五行，和合四象，命基巩固，寿址坚牢，度厄扶衰，解灾保算，益广好生之泽，上裨育物之仁。 蒙如所陈，允昭玄贶，恩惟大道，分别求哀。 臣愚谨因二官直使、正一功曹、左右官使者、阴阳神决吏、科车赤符吏、刚风骑置吏、驿马上章吏、飞龙骑吏进章，凤凰骑上章，云龙骑言章，风发骑御章，神龙骑奏章，飞龙飞虎骑各二人出操。 臣为斋主某人拜上某章，上诣三天曹，伏愿天恩告报，臣诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，再伊拜以闻。 谢土安宅章安宅斋用 臣矢心领教，励志度人，自揆疏庸，夙叨涵育，敢沥粟丝之捆，仰酬山岳之恩。 臣谨据斋意，臣切惟斋主某人继述，谋家辛勤，问舍经营，版筑莫奠，室庐填塞掘移，虑伤禁忌。 况星踱之临照与神煞之循环，练日练时，或因冒触，定方定位，恐致灾衰，期宁静於土司，盍皈依於帝阙，仰希福庆，预殄屯危。 谨为拜章一通，上闻三天，伏望皇极流祥，苍旻委监，特降玉清道炁，灵宝妙光，灌注斋主某人所造屋宅之中，内外辉华，迩遐洞焕，导迎万福，辟斥千妖，镇守真灵，各安隅界，触犯神煞，咸回善心，卜世卜年，永臻玄贶。 臣谨为上请谢土君、制土君、解土君、安土君、安定君、安宅君、五方保护君、解功破耗君各五人，官将各一百二十人，主解谢造宅已来，前后动土触犯禁忌。 太岁太阴大将军，一百二十位官符毒火吊客丧门上下神煞，悉令和释，其有方隅神祇，因掘凿权迁避者，请告谕宜复本位。 阳方君、安上君、右都候君、安石安土君各一人，官将各一百二十人，考官吏兵，主收摄土公之鬼，毋敢侵犯乡邑。 大夫神君守宅，大神守宅，三将军吏兵三十万人，主驱遣五方土炁故炁，遏绝邪精，毋令侵犯。 五岳将军，六甲神将，五方安宅大将军，护宅大将军，保宅大将军，镇宅大将军各一十一人，镇安宅舍，驱斥邪精，九横三灾，千殃万厄，悉皆消荡。 毋损居人，庶使斋主某人自今以往，百事康安，宅舍光鲜，门庭清谧，盗贼虚耗，远离他方，水火官灾，毋挠近部，鬼邪绝灭，疾病消除，瘴疫不兴，谋生称遂，诗书有耀，富贵无涯，眷属利安，以为效信。 遣疫疠保病章 臣滥膺选举，冒缀斑联、赛浅自惭，希夷未悟，扣宸合而屡请，腼灵府以知非，亶冀隆慈，曲垂涵贷。 臣谨据斋意，臣切念斋主某人尘寰涉迩，身世谋生，五欲七情，宁无翳累，百非众慝，易积愆尤，致寒暑燥湿之凭凌，乘身命运限之屯滞，忽沾疫炁，遂履危机，自非帝造之垂矜，曷俾余生之有庆，谨为拜章一通，上闻三天，伏望盛德，涵容玄恩，矜恤特降玉清道炁，灵宝妙光，灌注某人身家之中，俾正炁辉明，妖氛远离，消灾解厄，保命延生，臣谨为上请北阙九夷君，北黑天机君，运炁解厄君，地官督炁君各五人，官将各一百二十人，北城化吏五人，天市大夫一人，五瘟部炁兵四十万人，拒天大兵千万人，主收制疫毒，断除瘟炁。 东方九夷君，八十一官君，断青瘟青毒之炁。 南方八蛮君，六十四官君，断赤瘟赤毒之炁。 西方六戎君、三十六官君，断白瘟白毒之炁。 北方五狄君，二十五官君，断炁瘟炁毒之炁。 中央三秦君，一十二官君，断黄瘟黄毒之炁，大胡老君，家中守宅三将军，左右三部将军，赤阳兵士运炁解厄君，五瘟都炁君，吏兵各三十万人，与里社井邑君，主同心收除斩制疫鬼。

If Venus brings calamity, Mars shall restrain it.
If Mercury brings calamity, Saturn shall restrain it.

Thus may the Five Phases be regulated, the Four Symbols harmonized, the foundation of fate be secured, the span of life be fortified, calamities be averted, decline be supported, disasters be dissolved, and destiny be preserved. May the blessings of life be widely extended, and the benevolence of nurturing all things be upheld.

As herein petitioned, may the mysterious favor be manifest. With reverence for the great Dao, we humbly seek mercy.

Your servant, in foolishness, respectfully submits this memorial through the Direct Envoys of the Two Bureaus, the Orthodox Unity Merit Officers, the Left and Right Envoys, the Yin-Yang Divine Decree Clerks, the Scarlet Talisman Chariot Clerks, the Just Wind Courier Clerks, the Post-Horse Memorial Clerks, the Flying Dragon Cavalry Clerks, the Phoenix Cavalry Memorial Officers, the Cloud-Dragon Cavalry Petition Officers, the Wind-Swift Cavalry Escort Officers, the Divine Dragon Cavalry Memorial Officers, and the Flying Dragon and Flying Tiger Cavalry—each pair dispatched to present the memorial.

Your servant, on behalf of the retreat’s sponsor, [Name], respectfully submits this memorial to the Three Heavenly Bureaus. May the celestial grace respond in kind. Your servant, with awe and trepidation, bows his head to the ground, prostrates himself, and respectfully petitions for audience.

---

**Memorial for Earth-Thanking and House-Pacifying (Used in House-Pacifying Retreats)**

Your servant pledges his heart to the teachings and strives to deliver others. Though he measures his own inadequacy, he has long been nurtured by grace and dares to pour forth his meager devotion, aspiring to repay the boundless favor of the mountains and seas.

Your servant, in accordance with the retreat’s intent, reflects that the sponsor, [Name], in his worldly endeavors, has labored diligently to establish a household. In the construction of dwellings, the laying of foundations has been unsettled, and the shifting of earth and walls may have violated taboos. Moreover, the alignment of stars and the cycles of baleful spirits, the selection of days and hours, or inadvertent transgressions in direction and position may have invited misfortune. Seeking tranquility from the Earth Controller and refuge at the Imperial Threshold, he hopes for blessings and the preemptive dissolution of peril.

Respectfully submitting this memorial to the Three Heavens, may the August Ultimate bestow its auspicious influence, and the Azure Vault oversee and witness. May the qi of the Jade Purity Dao and the wondrous radiance of the Numinous Treasure descend and infuse the sponsor’s newly constructed dwelling, illuminating its interior and exterior, near and far, guiding myriad fortunes and repelling a thousand malevolent forces. May the true spirits be stationed to guard each corner, and any offended baleful spirits be turned toward benevolence. May generations and years be blessed with mysterious favor.

Your servant respectfully invokes:
- The Earth-Thanking Lords,
- The Earth-Restraining Lords,
- The Earth-Dissolving Lords,
- The Earth-Pacifying Lords,
- The Earth-Stabilizing Lords,
- The House-Pacifying Lords,
- The Five Directions’ Protective Lords,
- The Merit-Dissolving and Loss-Breaking Lords—each five in number,
- Their attendant officials and generals, one hundred twenty each,

to dissolve and absolve all violations of taboos incurred in the construction of the dwelling.

The Great Generals of the Grand Year and Grand Yin, the one hundred twenty official talismans, the baleful spirits of Toxic Fire, Hanging Guests, Funeral Gates, and all upper and lower malevolent forces—may they all be pacified and released. For any local deities displaced by excavation, may they be duly notified and restored to their original positions.

The Yang Direction Lords, the Upper-Pacifying Lords, the Right Capital Attendants, the Stone-Pacifying and Earth-Pacifying Lords—each one, with their attendant officials and generals, one hundred twenty each, and their inspecting officers and soldiers—are to gather and restrain the ghosts of the Earth Lords, preventing them from encroaching upon the village.

The Divine Lords of the Great Officers guarding the house, the Great Spirits guarding the house, and the Three Generals with their three hundred thousand soldiers are to expel and suppress the old qi of the Five Directions’ earth, intercept and sever malevolent spirits, and prevent them from encroaching.

The Generals of the Five Sacred Peaks, the Six Jia Divine Generals, the Five Directions’ House-Pacifying Great Generals, the House-Protecting Great Generals, the House-Guarding Great Generals, and the House-Securing Great Generals—eleven each—are to secure and pacify the dwelling, expel malevolent spirits, and dissolve the Nine Transverse Calamities, the Three Disasters, and the thousand misfortunes and myriad calamities.

May no harm come to the residents. Thus may the sponsor, [Name], from this day forward, enjoy peace in all affairs, a radiant dwelling, a serene household, and freedom from theft, loss, and misfortune. May water, fire, and official disasters not afflict his vicinity; may ghostly malevolence and illness be eradicated; may pestilence not arise; may his livelihood prosper; may his studies and arts flourish; may wealth and honor know no bounds; and may his family and dependents thrive in safety. Let this be the sign of efficacy.

---

**Memorial for Dispelling Pestilence and Protecting from Illness**

Your servant, unworthily appointed and presumptuously ranked among the honored, feels deep shame for his shallowness and has yet to attain the profound. Though he has repeatedly petitioned the celestial court and searched his own heart to recognize his faults, he humbly hopes for the boundless compassion of the august grace to bestow its nurturing mercy.

Your servant, in accordance with the retreat’s intent, reflects that the sponsor, [Name], though dwelling in the mundane world, must strive for his livelihood. Amid the Five Desires and Seven Emotions, how could he be free from obscuring entanglements? With the hundred wrongs and myriad transgressions, how could he avoid accumulating faults? Thus, he is assailed by cold, heat, dryness, and dampness, and his fate and destiny are beset by hardship. Suddenly afflicted by pestilential qi, he finds himself in peril. Without the imperial grace’s compassion, how could his remaining years be blessed?

Respectfully submitting this memorial to the Three Heavens, may the great virtue, in its boundless mercy, bestow the qi of the Jade Purity Dao and the wondrous radiance of the Numinous Treasure to infuse the sponsor’s body and household. May the upright qi shine brightly, malevolent influences be driven far away, disasters be dissolved, calamities be averted, life be preserved, and longevity be extended.

Your servant respectfully invokes:
- The Lords of the Nine Yi of the Northern Gate,
- The Lords of the Northern Black Heavenly Mechanism,
- The Qi-Directing and Calamity-Dissolving Lords,
- The Earth Bureau Qi-Supervising Lords—each five in number,
- Their attendant officials and generals, one hundred twenty each,
- The Five Transforming Clerks of the Northern City,
- The Great Officer of the Celestial Market—one,
- The Four Hundred Thousand Soldiers of the Five Pestilence Qi Divisions,
- The Ten Million Soldiers of the Great Celestial Army,

to gather and restrain pestilential toxins and sever the qi of epidemics.

The Lords of the Nine Yi of the East, the Eighty-One Official Lords, are to sever the green pestilence and green toxins’ qi.
The Lords of the Eight Man of the South, the Sixty-Four Official Lords, are to sever the red pestilence and red toxins’ qi.
The Lords of the Six Rong of the West, the Thirty-Six Official Lords, are to sever the white pestilence and white toxins’ qi.
The Lords of the Five Di of the North, the Twenty-Five Official Lords, are to sever the black pestilence and black toxins’ qi.

chunks.original_text: 中宫游逻大将军，科车武骑大将军，锋火虎贲大将军，监天敢健大将军，邀遮大将军，锋火大将军，骁骑大将军，斩断虎贲大将军，罗网龙虎大将军，讨捕飞行大将军，吞天绝地大将军各一人，吏兵七十万人，主收断五瘟积类，无侵邻里。 摇天动地兵十万人，讨天君，胡越骑君，阴阳神决吏，收炁食炁吏，收神食神吏，收鬼食鬼吏，收毒食毒吏各一人，执赤越大胡君千二百人，三五元命功曹使者，魁罡击刺将军各一十五人，金刚八煞兵士各九十六人，主收捕瘟鬼，扫荡疫炁，免相侵染，贻祸乡阊，即俾某毒羔消除，病源康复，天医扶体，灵药资身，家门尊卑，均臻景贶。 收邪断怪解厄保命章 臣蹄涔卑贱，茅径昏愚，夙沐洪恩，滥司玄教，誓度人而激切，庶赞化以承宣，凡有皈投，敢忘关告。 臣谨据斋意，臣切念斋主某人运逢屯否，身际妖邪，致寝食之仓皇，觉精神之颠倒，致生疾患，药饵罔功，恐涉冤愆，况绵莫释，历时既久，怪证愈探，自非请命於虚玄，曷克流恩於圆辐。 谨为拜章一通，上闻三天，伏望广运慈悲，曲加拯援，特降玉清道炁，灵宝妙光，灌注斋主某人身家之中，俾内外洞明，门庭辉焕，灵光所烛，邪祟远离，疾病安痊，寿龄延永。 臣谨为上请断邪天灵官功曹，摄神卫身吏，断邪使者，护身将军，检邪直符，斩邪刺奸吏，摄神使者，主驱逐精魅，收捕凶邪。 好生保命大将军，续命大将军，驱邪大将军，斩邪大将军，度厄大将军各一人，官将各一百二十人，主解除灾厄，却去精邪。 安平守石君一人，官将一百二十人，无上监炁君一人，兵士七十万人，天罡大兵五丁君一百万人，无上天生君五人，兵士一百二十人，盖天大将军，兵士七十万人，高麾大鼓五湖将军，反甲逆鳞兵四十万人，收鬼食鬼吏，收炁食炁吏，收神食神吏，主收捕诸恶君扰害生民。 无上中宫五曹校尉兵五十万人，清玄公君一人，官将一百二十人，主捕制鬼贼，陆梁犯人。 岁甲君、太甲君、朱阴君各一人，官将各一百二十人，五天侯将军兵士十万人，主擒戮精魅，剿荡无留。 阳明君一人，官将一百二十人，与所在真官诸部吏兵，社稷土地山林孟长，同心协力，和合家中守宅诸神，并力追捉，无令隐漏，摄赴天狱，依律荡除。 又为上请左右阴阳太医吏，救治病源，太和真一好生君，解禳恶曜，庶使斋主某人形体安和，邪精珍灭，疾病痊愈，药食调平，眷序康宁，门庭清肃，起居随意，谋为称心，永保利贞，以为效信。 保病解厄章资福斋用 臣学业愚蒙，性资荒陋，幸绿宿庆，僭陆真阶，誓婵济度之勤，庸报生成之德。 臣谨据斋意，臣切惟斋主某人命运灾衰，形神凋瘁，三业十恶，夙累行藏，六曜五星，偶凌次舍，忽染疾疢、寝食靡宁，药饵罔勋，日时浸久，夙宵惊战，控告无门，非赖帡幪，曷臻平复？ 谨为拜章一通，上闻三天，伏望隆慈，诞施惠泽，特降玉清道炁，灵宝妙光，灌注斋主某人身家之中，俾灾炁消除，灵光照耀，目今病患，早遂平安。 臣谨为上请阳秩君一人，司命吏一百二十人，各主重病未痊速令康愈。 须臾君、赤天食炁君各一人，官将各一百二十人，主久病困衰即得痊疗。 收神上明君一人，官将各一百二十人，主明畅精神，断除恶梦。

The Central Palace’s Patroling Grand General, Chariot and Cavalry Grand General, Vanguard Fire Tiger-Rush Grand General, Heaven-Monitoring Valiant Grand General, Intercepting Grand General, Vanguard Fire Grand General, Valiant Cavalry Grand General, Severing Tiger-Rush Grand General, Net-Dragon Tiger Grand General, Pursuing Flying Grand General, and Heaven-Swallowing Earth-Cutting Grand General—each one, with seven hundred thousand officials and soldiers—are to gather and sever the five pestilence accumulations, preventing their encroachment upon neighboring villages.

The Heaven-Shaking Earth-Moving Soldiers—one hundred thousand strong—the Heaven-Punishing Lords, Hu-Yue Cavalry Lords, Yin-Yang Divine Judgment Officials, Qi-Seizing Qi-Consuming Officials, Spirit-Seizing Spirit-Consuming Officials, Ghost-Seizing Ghost-Consuming Officials, and Toxin-Seizing Toxin-Consuming Officials—each one; the Red Yue Great Hu Lords—one thousand two hundred; the Three-Five Original Destiny Merit Officers and Envoys, and the Stalwart-Striking Piercing Generals—fifteen each; the Vajra Eight Slayers’ Soldiers—ninety-six each—are to gather and capture pestilence ghosts, sweep away epidemic qi, prevent mutual contagion, and avert calamity befalling the village gates, thereby dissolving the toxins afflicting so-and-so, restoring the source of illness, with Heavenly Physicians supporting the body and numinous medicines aiding the person, so that the household, from the honored to the humble, may together attain auspicious blessings.

**Petition for Gathering Malevolence, Severing Anomalies, Dissolving Calamities, and Preserving Life**

Your servant, humble and unworthy, dull-witted and benighted, has long been bathed in vast grace, presumptuously overseeing the Mysterious Teachings. Vowing to ferry others with fervor, I strive to assist in the propagation of transformation. For all who take refuge, how dare I forget to make supplication?

Your servant, in accordance with the intent of the fast, humbly reflects: the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, has encountered adversity in fate, his person beset by malevolent anomalies, leading to disquiet in sleep and sustenance, and derangement in spirit and mind. This has given rise to illness, where medicines and remedies prove ineffectual. Fearing entanglement in karmic grievances, which linger unresolved, as time passes, the strange symptoms grow more severe. Without petitioning the Void and Mysterious, how could grace flow to the encompassing hub?

Respectfully, I present a petition to the Three Heavens, prostrating in hope that boundless compassion will be generously bestowed, and special favor granted. May the Jade Clarity’s Dao-qi and Numinous Treasure’s wondrous radiance be poured into the person and household of the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, illuminating within and without, brightening the gates and halls. Where the numinous light shines, malevolent spirits shall depart afar; illness shall be pacified and healed, and longevity prolonged.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Heavenly Numinous Officials of Severing Malevolence, the Merit Officers, the Spirit-Guarding Body Officials, the Malevolence-Severing Envoys, the Body-Protecting Generals, the Malevolence-Inspecting Direct Talismans, the Malevolence-Severing Piercing Treacherous Officials, and the Spirit-Seizing Envoys, who are to drive away and expel spectral beings and capture inauspicious malevolence.

The Life-Preserving Grand General, Life-Continuing Grand General, Malevolence-Driving Grand General, Malevolence-Severing Grand General, and Calamity-Ferrying Grand General—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals each—are to dissolve calamities and dispel spectral malevolence.

The Peaceful Stone-Guarding Lord—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals; the Supreme Qi-Monitoring Lord—one, with seven hundred thousand soldiers; the Heavenly Stalwart Great Soldiers’ Five Ding Lords—one million; the Supreme Heaven-Born Lords—five, with one hundred twenty soldiers each; the Heaven-Covering Grand General, with seven hundred thousand soldiers; the Five Lakes’ Grand Drum Generals; the Armor-Reversing Scale-Inverting Soldiers—four hundred thousand; the Ghost-Seizing Ghost-Consuming Officials and Qi-Seizing Qi-Consuming Officials, and Spirit-Seizing Spirit-Consuming Officials, are to gather and capture all malevolent lords who harass the living.

The Supreme Central Palace’s Five Section Commanders’ Soldiers—five hundred thousand; the Pure Mystery Duke—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to capture and restrain ghostly bandits and overbearing criminals.

The Year Jia Lord, Great Jia Lord, and Vermilion Yin Lord—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals each; the Five Heavenly Marquis Generals’ Soldiers—one hundred thousand—are to seize and execute spectral beings, eradicating them without remnant.

The Yang Brightness Lord—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—together with the local true officials, various departments’ officials and soldiers, the altars of the soil and grain, the spirits of mountains and forests, and the elders of the graves, shall unite in strength with the household-guarding deities of the home, pursuing and apprehending without allowing concealment or omission, escorting them to the Heavenly Prison, and eradicating them according to the law.

Furthermore, I invoke the Left and Right Yin-Yang Grand Physician Officials to heal the source of illness; the Supreme Harmony True One Life-Preserving Lord to dissolve and dispel baleful influences. May the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, attain peace and harmony in body, the annihilation of malevolent spirits, the healing of illness, and the harmonization of medicines and diet. May his family and dependents enjoy well-being, his gates and halls be pure and solemn, his daily life proceed as he wishes, his plans and actions succeed, and may he forever preserve advantage and integrity, as a token of efficacy.

**Petition for Preserving Health and Dissolving Calamities, for Use in Blessing Fasts**

Your servant, ignorant in learning and coarse in nature, has fortunately received the blessings of former lives, presumptuously ascending the true ranks. Vowing to exert myself in salvation’s toil, I strive to repay the virtue of life’s creation.

Your servant, in accordance with the intent of the fast, humbly considers: the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, suffers from calamitous decline in fate, his form and spirit withered and emaciated. The three karmas and ten evils have long burdened his conduct and reclusion; the six luminaries and five planets have temporarily aligned in adverse positions. Suddenly afflicted by illness, his sleep and sustenance are disturbed; medicines and remedies prove ineffectual, and time passes ever longer. Startled day and night, he finds no avenue for appeal. Without relying on divine shelter, how could he attain recovery?

Respectfully, I present a petition to the Three Heavens, prostrating in hope that boundless compassion will generously bestow beneficent grace. May the Jade Clarity’s Dao-qi and Numinous Treasure’s wondrous radiance be poured into the person and household of the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, dissolving calamitous qi and illuminating with numinous light, so that his present illness may soon be pacified.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Yang Order Lord—one, with one hundred twenty Life-Commanding Officials—to swiftly heal severe, unhealed illnesses.

The Momentary Lord and Red Heaven Qi-Consuming Lord—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to heal long-standing, debilitating illnesses.

The Spirit-Gathering Supreme Clarity Lord—one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—is to clarify the spirit and mind, severing baleful dreams.

chunks.original_text: 赤星君、三天慰愈君各一人，官将各一百二十人，主制绝家亲，乘时构衅。 解考君，度命君，益算君，诛殃君，游逻大将军，地烧大将军各一人，官将各一百二十人，主收录邪精，辟除故炁。 火龙君，山周君，束明大夫君各五人，官将各一百二十人，主制医药黄衣。 节命玉女、月玄玉女各千二百人，主持神方太仙明堂。 玉女千二百人，主按方治病。 中宫大医吏十二人，主择方合药。 天医、官医、太医五官治病医吏，各一十二人，主入脏腑经络关节，行神存炁。 天曹、上平太医吏一十二人，治病功曹一十五人，主上诣凤凰太清宫中，取五色神药。 和合官君，治疗病患木官，持药金官，持针水官，主汤火官，主灸土官，和德各奏奇勋。 东青生炁君，南赤生炁君，西白生炁君，北黑生炁君、中黄生炁君，各领吏兵除邪收病。 南昌朱阳君，黄老君，天魂君，地魄君各一人，起生。 玉女，玉历素女各千二百人，主扶却灾危，度脱年命。 即俾斋主某人炁体康健，灾衰消散，精邪远避，殃讼和平，病患镯除，命身牢固，服药有效，动止无魔，命运亨嘉，以为效信。 传法授道祈恩谢过章传度用 臣误奉宸恩，滥承师派，期提后进，庸绍前修，僭陈捆幅之私，仰谢涵濡之泽。 臣谨据斋意，臣切惟女青玉律，选举至难，太极金科，保任尤重，傥传授有乖於践履，则师资俱冒於宪章。 今弟子某人洁己求真，愿参上法，静言障累，越有数端，或神炁难保於修龄，或骨相不符於道品，或九玄七祖冢讼未消，四负三生，凶仇犹结，或宿劫今世谴考尚萦，或故作误为，愆尤莫释。 匪赖甄陶之赐，曷谐愿望之隆？ 谨为拜章一通，上闻三天，伏望曲施玄厘，俯矜丹捆，特降玉清道炁，灵宝妙光，灌注弟子某人五宫六府之中，俾正炁辉华，道心开发，灵光罗络，妄累消镕。 仍乞救命，宣告三界十方，应干玄局，特为镯消考讼，解释愆尤，纪字玄编，定名青简。 臣谨为上请无上九天帝君，三十二天帝君，五老帝君、日宫月府，五星四曜，南辰北极，列宿星君，三省五师，三官九府天曹主执，四洞真灵，福地洞天，五岳四渎，地水职司，三界神祇，俱赴玄坛，证明传度。 又为上请灵宝六部，仙官三界，所向玄曹，赫奕仙曹，玄坛侍经，护道降真，召灵合属仙吏，九天司命府，青玄黄箓院，玉清神霄玉府，上清童初府，玄灵璇玑府，北魁玄范府，灵宝如意万司，九天溥度院，随所传俱开写将军神吏，玉童玉女，合该传授。 将吏官君，疾速分景化形，随逐香火伺候，交拨辅佐宣行。 庶弟子某人，证誓万灵，告盟众圣，勤修精进，学道参真，存念行持，济生度往，身膺仙职，心契玄宗，智慧洞明，慈悲利益，魔试寝绝，灵贶日臻，誉望兴隆，迩遐皈向，功圆道备，举形仙飞，永畅真风，益光宗绪，誓终浩劫，归戴玄元。 蒙如所陈，允昭圣造。 谢罪祈雨章雷霆斋合用 臣愚蒙无取，疏谬何庸，夙依覆育之恩，勉饬精修之志，承符领教，宣德济人，凡有皈投，理宜关告。 臣谨据斋意，臣切惟春耕秋敛，稼穑之常，久旱亢阳，炁运之变，傥时雨未敷於播种，则嘉禾曷望於丰登？ 况沟侩之如焚，极阊阎之愁叹，何以卒岁？ 坐见饥荒，谅万兆之积过浩繁，而司土之神明谴责匪县，帝力莫顾民哀。

The Red Star Lord and the Three Heavens’ Comfort-and-Heal Lord—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to restrain and sever familial strife that arises with the times.

The Release-from-Torment Lord, the Life-Span-Extending Lord, the Destiny-Augmenting Lord, the Calamity-Eradicating Lord, the Patroling Great General, and the Earth-Burning Great General—each one, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to gather and record wayward spirits, dispelling old qi.

The Fire Dragon Lords, the Mountain-Encirclement Lords, and the Brightness-Restraining Great Masters—five each, with one hundred twenty officials and generals—are to regulate yellow-robed physicians.

The Life-Commanding Jade Maidens and the Moon-Mystery Jade Maidens—one thousand two hundred each—are to uphold divine formulas and the Supreme Immortals’ Bright Hall.

One thousand two hundred Jade Maidens are to administer treatments according to prescriptions.

Twelve Grand Medical Officials of the Central Palace are to select formulas and compound medicines.

Twelve Heavenly Physicians, twelve Official Physicians, and twelve Grand Physicians of the Five Offices—each group of twelve—are to enter the viscera, bowels, meridians, and joints, circulating spirit and storing qi.

Twelve Heavenly Clerks of the Celestial Bureau and twelve Grand Medical Officials of the Upper Peace, along with fifteen Merit-Recording Clerks for Healing, are to ascend to the Phoenix Supreme Clarity Palace and retrieve the five-colored divine medicines.

The Harmonizing Official Lord, the Wooden Office for Healing Illnesses, the Metal Office for Holding Medicines, the Water Office for Holding Needles, the Fire-and-Water Office, and the Earth Office for Moxibustion—each one, in harmonious virtue—are to render extraordinary merit.

The East Azure Qi-Generating Lord, the South Vermilion Qi-Generating Lord, the West White Qi-Generating Lord, the North Black Qi-Generating Lord, and the Central Yellow Qi-Generating Lord—each, leading their officers and soldiers—are to expel evil and gather illness.

The Southern Prosperity Vermilion Yang Lord, the Yellow Elder Lord, the Heavenly Soul Lord, and the Earthly Spirit Lord—each one—are to revive and generate life.

One thousand two hundred Jade Maidens and one thousand two hundred Jade Calendar Plain Maidens are to support and avert disasters, delivering and liberating lifespans.

May the fast’s sponsor, so-and-so, thus enjoy a robust qi-body, with calamities and declines dissolved, pernicious spirits kept far away, litigations and misfortunes pacified, illnesses and afflictions eradicated, life and body secured, medicines efficacious, movements and rests free from demonic interference, and destiny flourishing and propitious—all as tokens of efficacy.

**Transmission of the Dharma, Conferral of the Dao, Prayer for Grace, and Atonement for Transgressions**

Your servant, undeserving of imperial favor and overstepping to inherit the lineage of masters, aspires to guide later disciples and humbly continue the work of former worthies. Presumptuously presenting this private petition, I look up in gratitude for the profound grace of nurturance.

Your servant, in accordance with the fast’s intent, reflects that the Jade Statutes of the Female Azure and the selection of candidates are most arduous, while the Golden Regulations of the Supreme Ultimate and the responsibilities of sponsorship are especially weighty. If transmission and conferral deviate from practice, both master and disciple will transgress the statutes.

Now the disciple, so-and-so, purifies himself to seek the true, wishing to partake in the supreme Dharma. Yet upon quiet reflection, hindrances and encumbrances are manifold: perhaps his spirit-qi is difficult to preserve for cultivation of longevity, or his bone-phase does not accord with Dao-potency; perhaps the lawsuits of his nine ancestors and seven generations remain unresolved, or the grudges of four debts and three lives persist; perhaps karmic retributions from past and present lives still linger, or past errors and present misdeeds remain unforgiven. Without the gift of refinement, how can his lofty aspirations be fulfilled?

Respectfully presenting a memorial, I submit it to the Three Heavens, hoping for the gracious bestowal of mysterious favor and the compassionate regard of this red petition. May the Dao-qi of Jade Clarity and the wondrous radiance of Numinous Treasure be poured into the five palaces and six mansions of the disciple, so-and-so, so that his upright qi may shine brilliantly, his Dao-heart be awakened, numinous light envelop him, and delusory encumbrances dissolve.

Further, I beseech the salvation of his life, proclaiming to the Three Realms and the Ten Directions, and all relevant mystical bureaus, to specifically eradicate and dissolve his karmic retributions and litigations, absolve his transgressions, inscribe his name in the Mysterious Register, and fix his destiny in the Azure Tablet.

Your servant respectfully invokes the Supreme Nine Heavenly Thearchs, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Thearchs, the Five Elder Thearchs, the Palace of the Sun and the Mansion of the Moon, the Five Planets and Four Luminaries, the Southern Asterism and Northern Culmen, the Star Lords of the Constellations, the Three Ministries and Five Masters, the Three Officials and Nine Bureaus, the Heavenly Clerks in charge, the True Spirits of the Four Caverns, the Grotto-Heavens of Blessed Lands, the Five Marchmounts and Four Watercourses, the Earth-and-Water Administrators, and the deities of the Three Realms—all to assemble at the Mysterious Altar and witness the transmission and conferral.

I further invoke the Six Divisions of Numinous Treasure, the Immortal Officials of the Three Realms, the Mysterious Bureaus of all directions, the Illustrious Immortal Bureaus, the Scripture-Attending Guardians of the Mysterious Altar, the Protectors of the Dao and Descenders of the True, the Summoned and Affiliated Immortal Clerks, the Nine Heavens’ Life-Commanding Mansion, the Azure Mystery and Yellow Register Courts, the Jade Clarity Divine Empyrean Jade Mansion, the Supreme Clarity Youthful Primordial Mansion, the Mysterious Numinous Pivot Mansion, the Northern Culmen Mysterious Model Mansion, the Numinous Treasure As-You-Wish Myriad Bureaus, the Nine Heavens’ Universal Salvation Court, and all relevant generals, divine clerks, jade lads, and jade maidens for the transmission.

Let the generals and officials swiftly divide their luminous forms, follow the incense and fire, wait upon the proceedings, and assist in the proclamation and execution.

May the disciple, so-and-so, swear oaths before the myriad spirits, pledge alliances with the host of sages, diligently cultivate and advance, study the Dao and seek the true, maintain mindfulness and practice, aid the living and deliver the departed, assume immortal office, align his heart with the Mysterious Origin, attain luminous wisdom, benefit with compassion, extinguish demonic trials, daily accumulate numinous blessings, enhance his reputation, draw near and distant followers, perfect his merits and complete his Dao, ascend bodily as an immortal, eternally propagate the true wind, glorify his lineage, vow to endure through the vast kalpas, and return to revere the Mysterious Origin.

If my petition is granted, may the sagely work be manifestly revealed.

**Atonement for Transgressions and Prayer for Rain: Memorial for the Thunder-and-Lightning Fast**

Your servant, foolish and unworthy, of no merit and full of errors, has long relied on the grace of nurturance and striven to refine his resolve. Charged with transmitting the teachings and promulgating virtue to aid others, I dutifully report all who seek refuge.

Your servant, in accordance with the fast’s intent, reflects that spring plowing and autumn harvest are the constants of agriculture, while prolonged drought and scorching yang are aberrations of qi-movement. If timely rain does not spread for sowing, how can fine grain be hoped for in abundant harvest? Moreover, the fields are parched as if burned, and the common folk are filled with sorrow and sighs—how can the year be brought to completion? Famine is imminent. Truly, the accumulated transgressions of the myriad masses are vast, and the divine reproach of the earth-administering deities is not slight. The power of the Thearch cannot attend to the people’s lamentations.
